annotation.text: The graph of a function and its asymptotes

A curve in 3 pieces. The left-most piece increases from nearly flat above y equals 1 to nearly vertical approaching x equals -3. The middle piece starts off nearly vertical and increases to an apparent maximum at 0 commma 4 over 9, then decreases symmetrically to nearly vertical near x equals 3. The right most-piece is a mirror image of the left-most piece, descending from near vertical near x equals 3 to flatten out near y equals 1
